title: USA vs Canada for Gold. The Last Game of Milan Cortina.
summary: The Olympic men's hockey final is today. America hasn't won gold since 1980.
content:
The final event of the 2026 Winter Olympics is the one everyone wanted.

**USA vs Canada.** Men's hockey. Gold medal.

America's last Olympic hockey gold came in 1980. The Miracle on Ice. 46 years ago today — February 22.

The coincidence is almost too perfect.

## 3 | US gold medals in men's hockey, ever (1960, 1980, and maybe today)

Canada has nine. They're the favourites. But the Americans have Connor Hellebuyck in net.

## .947 | Hellebuyck's save percentage — best in the tournament

Canada beat Switzerland 2-1 to get here. The US have looked dangerous all tournament.

>> "This is the game everyone wanted. Two nations, one puck, everything on the line." — NBC Sports

The closing ceremony follows tonight. The flame goes out. But first — one more game.

!! 46 years to the day since the Miracle on Ice. You couldn't script it better.
